attributes.action: sell all stocks and shares in the so called stake holder economy
attributes.additional_details: Top dogs and the ring leaders of the brutal exploitation of the middle classes is going on. The Politicians are just pawns being used by Large corporations.Top Men and women in the corpotaions are taking Billions of pounds home.They are casuing the energy crisis that we the ordinary people are suffering today where petrol is costing too much money. These corporations are using Politicians to create an atmosphere of fear, The Iraqi and the Afganistan wars have proved nothing at all as the WMD's didnt exist and the truth that Osama hit the twin towers is still shrouded in Political secrecy. The corporations that have done well are the oil barons, BP Mobil Shell and american oil companies too as well as American arms dealing companies such as Haliburton.By stopping to fund these Mercenaries we can stop of killing of innocent people all over the world. Iraqi war nearly half a million people killed.
